pddl4j.util

Class TaskNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • pddl4j.util.TaskNetwork

  • public class TaskNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a task network in HTN planning.

      • getMaxOccurrence

        public int getMaxOccurrence(int task,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> targetTasksList,
                            int tasksNumber)
        Find the max number of occurrence for a specified task
        Parameters:
        task - The task for which we search occurrence
        targetTasksList - The tasks list in which we search occurrence
        tasksNumber - The number of tasks in the domain it correspond to the size of relevant tasks table
        Returns:
        the occurrence number of the specified task in the task list

      • getAbsoluteIndex

        public int getAbsoluteIndex(int task,
                            int tasksNumber)
        Calculate the reference index for a task. It corresponds to the index of the task in the relevant tasks table
        Parameters:
        task - The task for which we search the reference index
        tasksNumber - The number of tasks in the domain it correspond to the size of relevant tasks table
        Returns:
        The reference index for the specified task

                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> tasks)
        Represents a task network in a String form
        Parameters:
        relevantTasks - The list of relevant tasks
        relevantFacts - The list of relevant facts
        constants - the list of constants in string form
        types - the list of types in string form
        predicates - the list of predicates names in string form
        functions - the list of functions names in string form
        tasks - the list of tasks names in string form
        Returns:
        a string representation of a task network
